results.title: How treatments with endocrine and metabolic drugs influence pituitary cell function
results.text_hl: The in vitro effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may also help highlighting differences in metabolic requirements between @<m>DISEASE_Adenomatous_Polyposis_Coli</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011125 @@@pituitary adenomatous@@@ cells and normal cells.
